players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I suspect Charlie is mafia because he was the one who discovered me. He might be lying. I think Diana is innocent. Vote for Charlie."
Diana: "I agree, Charlie must be the detective. Alice is the mafia. Vote Alice."
Charlie: "Bob was killed last night. Alice is mafia. I investigated her and found her role. Vote Alice."
You: "Charlie is lying, he might be mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she deflects. Vote Alice."
Diana: "I think Charlie is lying about investigating Alice. Vote Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I suspect Charlie is mafia because he was the one who discovered me. He might be lying. I think Diana is innocent. Vote for Charlie."
Diana: "I agree, Charlie must be the detective. Alice is the mafia. Vote Alice."
You: "Bob was killed last night. Alice is mafia. I investigated her and found her role. Vote Alice."
Alice: "Charlie is lying, he might be mafia."
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she deflects. Vote Alice."
Diana: "I think Charlie is lying about investigating Alice. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
